title: Beginner Basics
description: Our Preschool Swim classes are perfect for children ages 3 to 5 who are ready to take the next step in their swimming journey. These classes build on the foundation of water comfort established in Parent & Me, introducing basic swim strokes, breath control, and water safety skills. Our patient instructors create a supportive atmosphere where young swimmers can gain confidence and develop essential swimming techniques while having fun in the pool.

title: Youth Swim
description: Our Youth Swim program caters to children ages 6 to 12 at all skill levels, from beginners to advanced swimmers. Whether your child is just starting out or looking to refine their technique, our experienced instructors will provide personalized guidance to help them achieve their goals. Classes focus on stroke development, endurance building, and water safety education, ensuring that every swimmer progresses at their own pace while enjoying a positive and encouraging environment.
